None.Name: Deathcounter
None.Description: Weaves a curse onto an enemy structure that will make it explode after some time.  The time until the explosion occurs depends on the target's maximum health points: it takes 10 seconds per 1250 maximum health points before the targeted structure explodes. Reusable every 30 seconds.
